import Header from "../header"; import Footer from "../footer"; import { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Head from 'next/head' import { toast, ToastContainer } from 'react-nextjs-toast' import { wrapper } from "../../redux/store"; import Products from "../../components/productCrousel" import { GetPriceHtml, addToCart } from "../helpers"; export default function (product) { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const [minQty] = useState(product.minOrderQuantity ? product.minOrderQuantity : 1) const [maxQty] = useState(product.maxOrderQuantity ? product.maxOrderQuantity : 200) const [step] = useState(product.step ? product.step : 1) let productImages = [...[product.featuredImage], ...product.thumbnails] const setQuantity = (val) => { /* if (val < minQty) { toast.notify(`Invalid quantity, min order quantity is : ${minQty}`, { type: "error", title: "Quantity Error!!!" }) return; } if (val > maxQty) { toast.notify(`Invalid quantity, max order quantity is : ${maxQty}`, { type: "error", title: "Quantity Error!!!" }) return; } */ val = parseFloat(val) setQty(parseFloat(val.toFixed(2))) } const addProductToCart = () => { let cartStatus = addToCart(product, qty) if (cartStatus.status) { toast.notify(cartStatus.message, { type: "success", title: "Success!!!" }) } else { toast.notify(cartStatus.message, { type: "error", title: "Error!!!" }) } } useEffect(() => { productPageInit() }, []) return ( {product.metaTitle ? product.metaTitle : product.name}

); } export const getServerSideProps = wrapper.getServerSideProps(async (context) => { try { let product = await axios.get(`${process.env.API_URL}products/${context.params.slug}`) product = product.data; let relativeProducts = await axios.get(`${process.env.API_URL}products/relative/${product.id}`); relativeProducts = relativeProducts.data if (product.stockStatus) { if (product.manageStock && product.quantity <= 0) product.stockStatus = 0 } product.relative = relativeProducts; return { props: product } } catch (error) { console.log(error) return { notFound: true, } } })
